item.title: FAQ
item.description: How to invite Popsicle? You can invite Popsicle by using this link. Then select the server you want by using the dropdown menu and then select the permissions you would like the bot to have. Once done, hit invite and you’re done! :) Is Popsicle open source? No. More questions/answers will be added soon. Last updated: 9 August 2021.
